column5: Connie is one of our 10+ AirBnB units for rent at the Community First Village, a 27-acre master planned community for the homeless in East Austin. There is a nearby individual-style bathhouse and outdoor kitchen. Gardens, chickens, goats, donkeys, bees, blacksmithing, timber framing and more are happening right outside your window. It's a Village for the chronically homeless that is visited by thousands annually who come to experience the Village through our AirBnB as well as volunteer work!
column8: Connie - RV Tiny House at Community First Village
